attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.1215: newer gcc warns for implicit fallthrough

Problem:    Newer gcc warns for implicit fallthrough.
Solution:   Consistently use a FALLTHROUGH comment. (Christian Brabandt)
attachments.title: patch 8.0.1215: newer gcc warns for implicit fallthrough
attachments.text:
patch 8.0.1215: newer gcc warns for implicit fallthrough

Problem:    Newer gcc warns for implicit fallthrough.
Solution:   Consistently use a FALLTHROUGH comment. (Christian Brabandt)

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.1216: tabline is not always updated for :file command

Problem:    Tabline is not always updated for :file command. (Norio Takagi)
Solution:   Set redraw_tabline. (Hirohito Higashi)
attachments.title: patch 8.0.1216: tabline is not always updated for :file command
attachments.text:
patch 8.0.1216: tabline is not always updated for :file command

Problem:    Tabline is not always updated for :file command. (Norio Takagi)
Solution:   Set redraw_tabline. (Hirohito Higashi)
